-- This is auto-generated code


USE nyc_taxi_discovery

SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources;

GO
-- SELECTING DATA FROM FOLDER
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


-- SELECT DATA FROM FOLDER

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        -- You can use wildchard character as well.
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]



-- SELECTING FROM SUBFOLDERS
-- If you want to select data from subfolders recursively, you should use double **. 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


-- Select only from specific Subfolders

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        -- Use it within ()
        BULK 
        ( 
            'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*',
            'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*' 
        ),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]



-- Get File Name as well

SELECT
    TOP 100 *,
    -- use  .filename()
    my_result.filename() as file_name
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        -- Use it within ()
        BULK 
        ( 
            'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*',
            'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*' 
        ),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS my_result


-- How many rows in each file


SELECT
    my_result.filename() as file_name,
    COUNT(1) as reacord_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        -- Use it within ()
        BULK  'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS my_result
GROUP BY my_result.filename()
ORDER BY my_result.filename()




-- FilePath (folder + Filename)

SELECT
TOP 100
    my_result.filename() as file_name,
    my_result.filepath() as file_path,
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        -- Use it within ()
        BULK  'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS my_result



-- File Path Can also Take a Params



SELECT
TOP 100
    my_result.filename() as file_name,
    my_result.filepath() as filepath,
    -- This will take year from the folderpath in BULK
    my_result.filepath(1) as year,
    my_result.filepath(2) as month,
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK  'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS my_result



-- FIltering File Name
-- By this way we can select the files we want based on year month and etc.

SELECT
    my_result.filename() as file_name,
    my_result.filepath() as filepath,
    my_result.filepath(1) as year,
    my_result.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK  'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS my_result
WHERE 
    my_result.filepath(1) = '2020'
    AND my_result.filepath(2) in ('06', '07', '08')
GROUP BY my_result.filename(), my_result.filepath(1), my_result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY my_result.filename(), my_result.filepath(1), my_result.filepath(2)



SELECT
    my_result.filename() as file_name,
    my_result.filepath(1) as year,
    my_result.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK  'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS my_result
WHERE 
    my_result.filepath(1) = '2020'
    AND my_result.filepath(2) in ('06', '07', '08')
GROUP BY my_result.filename(), my_result.filepath(1), my_result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY my_result.filename(), my_result.filepath(1), my_result.filepath(2)
